channel.title: CVE Feed for CELSYS, Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CELSYS, Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-0580|2024-08-05T03:28:11.132Z -- celsys%2C%20inc. -- clip%20studio%20series
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in CELSYS, Inc CLIP STUDIO series (CLIP STUDIO PAINT (for Windows) EX/PRO/DEBUT Ver.1.7.3 and earlier, CLIP STUDIO ACTION (for Windows) Ver.1.5.5 and earlier, with its timestamp prior to April 25, 2018, 12:11:31, and CLIP STUDIO MODELER (for Windows) Ver.1.6.3 and earlier, with its timestamp prior to April 25, 2018, 17:02:49) allows remote attackers to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
